website_summaries.verdict: The Coby MID8065 is an affordable Android tablet with an in-between 8-inch screen size and uncommon aspect ratio. It's a decent performer, but if you can spend a little more, there are better options.

customer_reviews.title: I love this tablet.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tablet because I wanted something "cheap" and of good quality, and judging by the reviews I would not be disappointed. I am 100% pleased! It's fast, responsive, it doesn't lag, downloads all the apps very fast and smoothly, WIFI connection is nice and steady. Graphics are crisp and beautiful, sound is really good, setting up my emails, FB and Twitter was a breeze. When fully charged it lasts all day which is perfect for my needs. I think it's an amazing little tablet, why spend so much more for a tablet that does the same thing? I am getting 3 more for my kids for Christmas. They LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Yeidy

customer_reviews.title: Not really happy with this.
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a n OK tablet, at least for me it would be. But, since this is for my wife, she found it less than satisfactory. First, it takes a long time to boot up and sometimes gets hung up and you have to hold the power button to restart. Next is the poor battery life. The longest we got was 2 hours. Which is really not satisfactory. Otherwise it has a good selection of apps, the display seems OK. I would say if you want a tablet on a budget this is fine. But remember to have your charger nearby. Also, the charger is not your phone charger. It uses another style of plug.
customer_reviews.author: DoggieDadVATop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as intended, slow webpage loading, poor WiFi connection
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this solely for my mom to be able to use the Walmart Grocery app. The app couldn't be installed. When attempting to use the website for Walmart Grocery, it wouldn't load completely or operate properly, making the tablet useless for its intended purpose. Also, unless you are literally sitting on top of your WiFi it wouldn't work. I would not recommend purchasing this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: RLG

customer_reviews.title: Nice, inexpensive tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my wife, she digs it. Me... I think it's a solid little guy, fast and does all that one expects from an Android tablet. My one issue is the screen has a bluish cast to it. The wife doesn't mind it - she actually didn't/doesn't notice it... but me, I see blue. I'm using an old Nook color and I don't see blue. My old Samsung Captivate... no blue. Our laptops, desktops, television... nada bit of blue. The Korby... a slight blue cast. But... she likes it, it's fully loaded and does what a tablet is supposed to do, so I guess I won't be returning it for a replacement. There you have it.
customer_reviews.author: just-us

customer_reviews.title: I Love my Android!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product after seeing a tablet in action from a friend who had bought a Nexus 7 Android and doing some research on tablets. Believe me when I tell you that the Coby 7-Inch Android 4.0 8 GB Internet Tablet 16:9 Capacitive Multi-Touch is much better then the Nexus7 because it has basically the same software installed and it lets you install additional micro sd card for storage and/or use a usb stick but a converter cable from usb female to mini usb male is required. I had also ordered a keyboard/cover for it that came with said adapter cable so that saved me a little. Overall a fantastic deal and much fun for power users too :)
customer_reviews.author: Kenja

customer_reviews.title: Value for price.
customer_reviews.text: It is great for the price. I needed to replace a similar one that got crunched. This is very similar with a bit more capacity. It would not replace an iPad, but you can do your emails & facebook.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: excellent tablet - very fast
customer_reviews.text: My previous tablet was g-tablet from Viewsonic - a nvidia dual core. I have updated it's operating systems several times. With each new version of Android OS it became a little faster. But compared to this tablet its like a turtle versus hare. This tablet respond immediately whenever you presses a app and it can easily handle multiple apps. So far every apps that I tried worked well. I haven't found any limitation so far. This tablet is as fast as my Motorola Atrix phone (which is another dual core android device that very fast).
customer_reviews.author: J. Ding

customer_reviews.title: 2 Thumbs up for the amazon tablet underdog!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My first impression was surprising good. Screen is good, color of good, sound of ok, speed is good, response time is good, wifi is good and strong, a lil heavy but that's good because of it was too light it could be mishandled, battery life is good so far, connects to labtop with no problem, downloaded divers with no issues....no complaints so far.....great tablet for the price, actually great tablet regardless of the price!!!!
customer_reviews.author: valued customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding , has USB port
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a tablet. I was actually shopping for a different brand...and realized NO USB port for additional memory ! This unit is economical, android system, and purse size. I do not have to lug around my laptop. It has the capacity to sync with my laptop and stored documents, pictures. I LOVE this item. My grandkids play games. I read my emails and play my solitaire. Purse size is so convenient. This definitely is a Christmas idea ! for grand munchkins !
customer_reviews.author: homemaker in Wloo

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase - Company out of Business
customer_reviews.text: The tablet stop working properly after several months. Coby gave instructions to send in for warranty repair. I had to pay shipping as well as provide a $20 money order for return shipping. I never received the tablet back. Coby has been bought out by Gordon Brothers Group. Gordon Brothers say they assume no liability for Coby warranties, including those that had already been sent in. Many people are out tablets and the money they sent in. Do not take a chance with Coby products!
customer_reviews.author: blueboars

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 different cheaper tablets from amazon and returned all three of them two were doa and one died in a week. I finally decided to take a chance on the coby and not only is it more reliable but it's way faster than the others. So far i'm loving how well it works. Will update if this changes in anyway. but some advice... Spend the extra money and get the coby instead of the dragontouch or the agptek, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Tablet is a disaster stay away
customer_reviews.text: This tablet was awful I tried to type Wi-Fi password it was clicking other things by itself save your money returning item after headache trying to get immediate refund
customer_reviews.author: Joe Abruscato

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this tablet for my husband that replace his Zeepad that was a Christmas present that got broken. I wasn't sure about these but they seemed to have good reviews. I am amazed and pleased because I have a Samsung Tablet that my children got me for Mother's Day and this tablet is as fast and works as good as mine does. I have recommended this to my friend and she has purchased four and getting ready to get her fifth.
customer_reviews.author: Regina F. Love

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I admit I was initially skeptical about how well this tablet would perform. I also did not want to spend 2 or 3 times the amount on another brand name product that essentially does the same thing. Have used this tablet for several days, downloaded several apps from the Google Play store and dived into most of its features. Excellent product!. Very fast, stable and easy to use! Buy one! You won't regret it! Good luck! Update ------ Just used the Kindle reading app. and downloaded a bunch of books that were already on my older Kindle. Worked like a charm. Great reading experience. Page turns are fast and the text and color are great!
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Nice bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a nice reliable tablet and that is what I got. There were more expensive ones, but they were overkill. This does exactly what I want and gives me complete access to the Google Play store for apps. I love this little device! The on/off button and volume buttons are kind of in a funky spot. I accidently hit them on occasion. But it's not a deal breaker. I just have to be more careful.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Web Surfing, Videos and Music
customer_reviews.text: The Coby is an affordable mini-tablet that's great for the price. The wifi can be iffy when you're using it on public hotspots with weak or far away signals (my laptop and phone can pick up on the same signals, but the Coby cannot or frequently drops it). Video plays well, as long as you have a strong wifi signal. Apps are on Google Play, so you have a wide variety of apps to choose from. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: honestreviews

customer_reviews.title: Coby Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the Coby Tablet. It is my first tablet so I don't have any comparisons but for me it is perfect. I am somewhat frustrated in trying to find accessories like bluetooth keyboards, carry cases, silicone protective covers, etc but the machine itself operates great, android system and google playbook approved so all apps load & operate beautifully. I have not tried the camera's yet but looking forward to that learning curve and experience. And to beat everything I did not have to break the bank in getting one. Love the price point and quality
customer_reviews.author: antoinette kunda

customer_reviews.title: Order on April 30th and Battery stop working.
customer_reviews.text: The battery stop working and wont charge had the unit for close to 4 months. Contact Coby and only got an answering machine to go to the website for support or service. The website says to call the number for replacement parts warranty. This is just the run around. Keep in mind that I called on a Sunday and waiting til Monday to try again. =/ will give a better review when everything is taken care of.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nuon

customer_reviews.title: My little tablet
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tablet the only thing I found that I would like is to be able to underline or highlight text. I wanted an inexpensive tablet to read books, play games, put pictures on surf the internet which it does very well. I'm not a big computer person so this fits the bill for me. The picture is bright the text is good, I'm happy. However, don't be in a hurry when you turn it on it takes a while to boot up, but other than that I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi:)

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this unit....I did not realize it was Bluetooth capable so that was a very we'll come bonus. I have connected it to hot spots, other BT devices, downloaded several play store apps and ebooks and more...it has yet to fell me. It hasn't been herd long but i must say, it is a great product at a great price with a lot of versatility...if it holds up for a year or two it will have been well worth it... .
customer_reviews.author: Juantonamo

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price and if it werent for a couple of problems, we would do a commercial for the company with how happy we would be! My reason to buy it was to help my wife have a more practical way of working on the go but to even get it to recognize Gmail and sync it was ridiculous! Downloading doc files has also proven to be impossible thus far as she needs to edit materials and can not access them. Also, you are not given administrators rights.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Beware CobyUSA appears to be going out of business!
customer_reviews.text: 1) Tried to send unit in for warranty repair. 2) Called number listed on warranty card. 3) Voice recording says see web page. 4) Web page only allows email to Tech Support or Customer Service. 5) No answer to either email in 2 weeks. 6) Called corporate office and notified that due to SEVERE LAYOFFS they are not accepting any warranty repair/replacement requests. 7) To bad, good product when it worked! DO NOT BUY COBY USA is my advice.
customer_reviews.author: Chet Fielden

customer_reviews.title: Good Tablet for Old Lady
customer_reviews.text: My son tried to talk me into buying a tablet because I read so much and my eyes are getting old and it is harder to see the small print in paperback books. I thought these where mostly for the young people. I am 60 and I love this tablet. Love to get free books on the kindle. Love that you can increase the letter size to huge letters. I am so happy with this tablet, I should have gotten one long ago. Got my son one too and he said this one is really a good one. He has had them before but not as good as this one. great product. Got it before the price went up.
customer_reviews.author: KLK

customer_reviews.title: This tablet is as good or better in my opinion due to the fact ...
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is as good or better in my opinion due to the fact that apps can be moved to the sd card. It operates as well as the 7" Samsung tab 3 that was given to me . My 7" coby was stolen and has not been found , so picking this coby kyros 10.1 mid1065-8 definitely was for the best .It performance is far better and smoother than that old the older one.
customer_reviews.author: popup59

customer_reviews.title: coby tablet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace another 7-inch android tablet that broke when it was sat on. That tablet had no brand name, and I had identified a few things I would improve about it if I were to replace it. I did not anticipate having to replace it when I did, but the list of requirements did enable me to narrow down my tablet choices significantly.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Reinefeld F

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!  Less than 1 star.
customer_reviews.text: As others have noted, this tablet has been a huge disappointment. My 7 year old used her own money she had been saving to buy this tablet. She used it frequently and took VERY good care of it. 3 months later and the screen has gone completely white. It is utterly unusable. The company must no longer be in business as the phone numbers listed only directs you to the website which directs you back to the same phone number. My daughter is pretty upset to say the least. I, on the other hand, am absolutely livid. What a horrible experience.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: OMG - Such better quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought my grandsons the Tab Nero's but ended up having to return them as they stopped powering up after 2 days. Decided to pay a little more and chose this one as my husband has an older Coby model that keeps on ticking! The quality of this is so much better than the cheap plastic of the Tab Nero. This is heavier and well built. The internet is very fast and the picture is very clear.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M.

customer_reviews.title: what a machine
customer_reviews.text: Tried a Samsung for my grandson and the plug in adapter melted the inside. The Coby plugs in with a totally different system making it a much sturdier tablet. Now that it comes with Google Play, who would want any other tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Dia L

customer_reviews.title: good for little kids read or watch videos not able ...
customer_reviews.text: good for little kids read or watch videos not able to use play store or get any apps -5...didn't work long
customer_reviews.author: Angelica T.

customer_reviews.title: dust under display
customer_reviews.text: items on top and bottom edge of screen don't match up to touch I didn't notice all the dust 'till I took it outside - it looks like it was assembled in a saw mill wifi reception is weaker than most other items I've used now there are better deals out there
customer_reviews.author: zpm

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: Great Tablet...this is the 3rd tablet i have bought on Amazon and now i can finally say i found the rite one. First 2 didn't work out to well ( they where not the Coby mid 7065). This tablet performs really good for an inexpensive tablet.....love it
customer_reviews.author: Jim E.

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift for a teenage friend and she loves it. She uses it daily for social media and mp3 player, for came5a and slideshows. She has had no problems with it at all and has had it now about 8 months. No it is not a high end tablet. But for what it is is pretty dern good.
customer_reviews.author: Notypst

customer_reviews.title: Great value and performance!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Price, performance. Cons: Only one camera. You can do video chat, but not take pictures of other people. Can't expect that for this price though. I only gave 4 stars due to the proprietary power connection. A USB power connection would have gotten the fifth and final star.
customer_reviews.author: Data Pro

customer_reviews.title: can not beat the price
customer_reviews.text: really good, I've bought APPLE: OVER PRICED. GOOGLE'S NEXUS,: OVER-RATED, NOT USER FRIENDLY. I returned both of them. Bought one "COBY 7" 4.0 GB INTERNET 16:9 CAPACITIVE MULTU-TOUCH" (be sure of which one you're buying theirs many out there. look 4 1-GB RAM) I bought 3 more to give @ CHRISTMAS TIME in the PHILIPPINES) Price about $100.+ case $12= $112/115. real good unite + extra storage up too 32 GB. Can not beat the price,
customer_reviews.author: John F. Rakoski

customer_reviews.title: Not such a good buy
customer_reviews.text: The price and initial reviews is why I bought my daughter this tablet. The color and ease of function is great. The major downside is the frequency in which it freezes up. We had no problems with it for the first 2 - 3 weeks, then it started freezing. Some days up to 5 or 6 times. It also gets hot very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $200 I paid.
customer_reviews.text: I seldom write reviews but this is worth it. I've had it for 3 months. The tablet boots quickly. All apps I've chosen so far work as advertised and start instantly. Switching between apps is easy. I often run 2 or 3 apps simultaneously and have noticed no sluggishness. The tablet seems sturdy enough, though I am a careful user. All in all I'd recommend it to anyone. It is Google apps certified so choice of apps is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Martin E. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Love the Coby 1065
customer_reviews.text: The Coby has wonderful apps. It is easy to use with a gentle touch. The camera is okay, but I really didn't buy it for the camera. I use it for internet and Kindle. The only problem I had was finding a folding case for it. After trying several, I found out that there is no case for the 1065. You have to order a case for a Coby 1045 and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bdera

customer_reviews.title: Had it 10 days, good value so far
customer_reviews.text: For the price it does a lot. It isn't an iPad but so far is a good gift for a 12 yr old. I have an older Vizio single processor tablet, it is definitely faster than that and is cheaper too, has HDMI out which I haven't tried but assume it works. The case feels plastic-y, a more rigid back would make it 5 stars for me. Will keep tabs, as long as it holds up will stay 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Northeast Nerd

customer_reviews.title: Seller advertised as new. Not so fast.
customer_reviews.text: The seller advertised this item which at the time of my purchase, was fulfilled by Amazon as being new. Yeah, right. All seals were broken, scratches and stains were found on the screen and a sticker was on the outside of the box stating that it was returned previously due to it failing to charge. Are you serious???? The seller was COLORADO DISTRIBUTORS
customer_reviews.author: DeLoreanfan1

customer_reviews.title: cost effective tablet
customer_reviews.text: great economical tablet like the screen size and display apps easy to add with play store loaded already expansion card slot great to load video clips or movies in order to watch on tablet. We use it by downloading videos from you tube and watching in case we do not have wifi to watch clips on you tube on the tablet my kids ages 6 & 2 have no problem using the tablet, a great buy
customer_reviews.author: N. Post

customer_reviews.title: broke easily
customer_reviews.text: While this product was great at first it is cheaply made. I dropped it on our carpeting not even two feet, and the plastic cracked . Within a week the crack was all the way down the plastic. I feel as though I was given a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: frenner

customer_reviews.title: Coby 7 inch Android 8 GB Internet Tablet 16:9 Captive Mulit Touch Screen
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tablet. Just what I was expecting and was described in the Ad. Great Price for such a wonderful tablet. Loads the OS very quickly and setup is a snap. Connected to my wireless system seamlessly. If you are looking for a great tablet at a superb price check this one out.
customer_reviews.author: huey

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS TABLET - Coby Is Out of Business
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS TABLET! I purchased this tablet on July 27th, 2013 and it quit working after 6 weeks of use. I tried calling and emailing Coby Electronics technical support and customer service departments, but I was shocked to find out that the company is no longer in business. Now I have a $122 paper weight!
customer_reviews.author: MEWGRT

customer_reviews.title: Very good economical  purchase
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product for the amount I paid at its release ($109). However, I bought a bluetooth keyboard to use with it to no avail. It appears I cannot use any other keyboard as such with it. Otherwise, some positives are: expandable memory to 32 gb with an sd card, hdmi ready, GOOGLE PLAY (major plus), Ice Cream (unfortunately there is no update), and bluetooth of course. Netflix looks decent on it and the dual core processor works fairly well. 4 stars due to the keyboard issue.
customer_reviews.author: D. V.

customer_reviews.title: Limited but ok for a first step into tablets
customer_reviews.text: Getting to know this technology as coming from MAC/Apple environment. It takes some getting used to but it is doing what I need when the main computer is not available or I'm on the road and need to view weather, news, email, surf, or check Etsy shop. (although that took contacting an expert. Not exactly transparent usage I thought.) Does run out of battery power really quickly after about 4 hours of constant use.
customer_reviews.author: Cherrie S.

customer_reviews.title: COBY 7INCH ANDROID 4.0 GB INTERNET TABLET
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A GIFT TO ANOTHER OF MY GRAND DAUGHTERS, I HAVE 15 GRANDCHILDREN, WHO HAVE BIRTHDAYS ALL YEAR LONG. I KNOW SHE WILL LOVE IT, AS MUCH AS SHE HAS LOVED HER DAD'S, TILL NOW. IT WILL BE HERS IN A FEW WEEKS, MC
customer_reviews.author: Marie C.

customer_reviews.title: Watch netflix, youtube
customer_reviews.text: This product is strong and does the job it was bought for. Watch netflix, youtube, play fun games, etc. Mine still going strong after over a year of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Epelle

customer_reviews.title: good tablet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet, so far the only bad thing I can say is the battery is not very good. I am actually on here to find a car charger for it. Besides that this is a fabulous tab if you are like me, that being using it for basic net surfing and lots of music. I can run multiple windows with no lag and dl music. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: love this tablet
customer_reviews.text: does everything I want, it is fast, and color is awesome. Travels in bag on flights, loaded games and movies, and away I go. Has good battery life - no complaints. Very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: rrcer

customer_reviews.title: mine :)
customer_reviews.text: my mom brought this for me and her and I must say I show this off to everyone! I love it. currently using it to write the review...fast,easy,my 4 yr old even uses it. So we love it! <3
customer_reviews.author: Latoya

customer_reviews.title: USB port died
customer_reviews.text: The USB port died after about 3.5 months of use. It will still charge using the included AC adapter but the USB port is now useless. Do yourself a favor and spend the extra few bucks and get a Nexus 7. You'll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Hardrock

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these as gifts. One of them never did work (failed to charge or turn on) so I ended up buying a replacement. If they work for you great, but I would not buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Philbert

customer_reviews.title: This is a piece of Crap!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This tablet worked for a total of one week and then it froze. It will not shut down or restart. I let the battery drain so that it can shu down on it's own. after it has been charged back up, the screen got jumbled and i cannot log in to the home screen. It is not even up to a month to this day since I bought it and it still did not work. I am now having a hard time trying to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coby 8-inch
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase of this tablet. I mostly play games on it, but I can also check my emails or go on line when I need to. It is easier to carry this than my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Devlin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Pros Cheap Light enough Runs android Capacitive (not pressure sensitive) touch screen is not bad Also, cheap Cons Slow, but not more than expected Older version of android is a bit ugly
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my kids
customer_reviews.text: perfect my kids ages 3,6,8. they can work it easily without needing my help constantly. the picture quality is bad and only has front camera which is my only complaint. otherwise i love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for my son
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after seeing the price of the children based tablets and the kindle fire. Does all the basics web surfing, email, pictures/videos,,, a great buy for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Keough

customer_reviews.title: It's a Kindle Fire - just with the Coby name!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe you can buy this tablet for less than $100! I have had a Kindle Fire and used a Samsung Galaxy and the Coby MID7065 is more responsive, just as crisp and all around better value. The sound quality is good and resolution equal to a Kindle Fire, when I opened the box, I told my wife I believe Coby contracts with Amazon and this tablet IS a Kindle Fire without the name! You cannot go wrong with this tablet whatsoever! BUY BUY BUY
customer_reviews.author: bige247

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Fair enough, great for kids rather than spending over 100 bucks for tablets. You can connect on line and do what you need to do. The buts are not bright enough, I looked at the settings of the brightness and is was all the way up the camera can only look into one direction ( has no dual view) and not bright enough to take pictures Otherwise it is great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Juliea

customer_reviews.title: Worked right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Got it for our daughter to replace defective Meep. It worked right out of the box, no updates required. The battery life is a little short but it works great overall. I thought it came with a flash player but so far have not be able to go on any flash player web sites. That is the only disappointing thing since my daughter likes a lot of online game websites that are flash based. Otherwise a great tablet for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coby Internet Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with my Coby tablet. It's fast, easy, and I love it. Great for watching Netflix, email, Facebook and much, much more. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lackqueen

customer_reviews.title: Great if it works. You're SOL if it doesn't.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted four months before the charging port quit working. Trying to contact Coby customer support let me to discover that Coby went out of business in July. I'd be more descriptive, but the pain is too fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Constant Reader

customer_reviews.title: this was a bad tablet
customer_reviews.text: this product only functioned for a short time ,, poor boards , the power supply was faulty and just not worth the money , I would have excepted it to work for more than a few months
customer_reviews.author: Eve King

customer_reviews.title: Trust me this is a good product. Only issue is no updates
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a rock! A 6-7 year old using it and it still works. Trust me this is a good product. Only issue is no updates, and rooting it is long gone. Good experience in the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: VuLoN

customer_reviews.title: OK for the money.
customer_reviews.text: A bit too slow and complicated...I really despise this word counting software, if I want to say something then I will say it.
customer_reviews.author: Aviletron

customer_reviews.title: perfect tablet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 year old daughter. Everything works just fine. Games run at good speed. No complains at all. I will definitively buy one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela  Pienknagura

customer_reviews.title: back for another
customer_reviews.text: bought for myself end of May after much looking and reading of reviews. I love my tablet! I am returning to buy one for my 8yr old granddaughter its that durable and with square trade its Perfect. Also price has dropped since then. We prefer the Coby over our Samsung galaxy tab2
customer_reviews.author: Dawn W

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price.
customer_reviews.text: Good for the Price, but seriously needs a car charger. Other than that, I'm pretty satisfied with it. James Barnes
customer_reviews.author: James Barnes

customer_reviews.title: she love it
customer_reviews.text: I gave the coby 7in to my daughter for a gift. She can read on the train to and from work. She in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I take this thing everywhere. Came on time and works well for what I want it to do. Would recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Emily Thrasher

customer_reviews.title: Boring very fast
customer_reviews.text: It got very old very fast. I also dropped it once, and you could pull the back of it apart from the actual tablet!
customer_reviews.author: maggardo

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE my tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I mainly wanted this because I have trouble writing & needed something I could take notes on. This works great for that & so much more. I am an old lady & having a blast with my tablet & tell all of my friends...young & old....that they need to get one. It is amazing. I know I have not learned all that I can do with bot but I will learn cuz I love my gadgets!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Kaye Gundersen

customer_reviews.title: worst. tablet. ever.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these... one for each of my kids. They didnt even last a year. They freeze all the time and my daughters wont even turn on anymore. Waste of money! But hey.. you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Leslie huddy

customer_reviews.title: My experience
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for its price, plus excellent tool for daily work, it is fast and the applications are ideal for when you are traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin F. Perez Cruz

customer_reviews.title: it does the job
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. No frills. Not the most powerful, and the wifi is somewhat short range compared to higher end tablets. Battery life is good.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Z. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first tablet so I have nothing to compare it to, but I have no problems with it. It works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ninkie

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for a family member
customer_reviews.text: Came sooner than expected, was packaged perfectly with everything that was stated. It looks like it's brand new =) This was a birthday gift that made my niece freak out =) lol. They also sent some cleaning clothes and a sleeve along with it. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: S. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Great cheap tablet. The battery could last longer but at this price point, it's to be expected. I got this for my clients to play with while they wait in the office.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: I love this tablet.
customer_reviews.text: love this tablet,, I got it to check email shop and a few games. In fact I'm on it right now
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: So far So good
customer_reviews.text: really like this item and it was as described...arrived in a timely manner and so far it has met with my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lynn Claycomb

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very slow, Just expected more for the money. Locked up on me after 10 - 15 minutes each time I logged on it. Now sitting in the box collecting dust.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet!!
customer_reviews.text: This tablet for the money works great, has good speed, clear pictures on screen, very easy to set up and operate....
customer_reviews.author: Stoney52

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a pressie, screen cracked after use and Amazon credited $ back all good
customer_reviews.author: John Quick

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: An average product, I guess you get what you pay for. Not very responsive to the touch and the battery does not hold the charge.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: BAD charging port and battery
customer_reviews.text: The charging port on the Tablet is bad! You have to hold and manipulate the plug to get it to charge.If you are able to finally get it to charge the battery doesn't hold a charge long, even when the Tablet is not in use. Tis is not something I would recommend to anyone, but I would like to warn them. I will be trying to get a good replacement. I'll keep you posted
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic experience with this tablet
customer_reviews.text: This tablet has the lowest price compared to the similar products. But it has a perfect performance, the screen can be touched smoothly and the system is fluid.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what I want
customer_reviews.text: At first I purchased this item for the price, but I have used it for about 2 weeks and I am very satisfied and may purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product but it doesn't accept all Android apps. Slow and hangs up a lot. Would recommend a Nexus but not bad for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Warren A. White

customer_reviews.title: Almost good enough to keep........
customer_reviews.text: What a shame, if only it would stream google play music. Everything else looked good but that's the way it goes.
customer_reviews.author: James Zelenka

customer_reviews.title: coby 7-inch android
customer_reviews.text: great tablet for the money. i would highly recommend this tablet.it has great colors.blazing fast speed.and it great for taking anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: dana

customer_reviews.title: like it
customer_reviews.text: the table it so fun to use and easy to take with me ,,I wish I had got one sooner
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: its good my little bro uses it so he likes it plus its cheaper then an ipad so that's a plus
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Risky buy!
customer_reviews.text: I had it for less than a year and the touch screen no longer works. Now I find out that Coby has been sold off and the new owners aren't having anything to do with old products. So I'm basically stuck with a non-funtional tablet and a lot of books I can't read. It was a great little tablet until it broke. Hence the second star.
customer_reviews.author: Paula A. Henson

customer_reviews.title: Nice tablet
customer_reviews.text: Love it can get all the apps i want. From books to games movies tv shows etc. Fast and responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these for my grand daughters, they have been using them for about a year now and they have served them well. They are completely happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: VegasVisionStudios

customer_reviews.title: ... My wife is pleased, then I am pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Great look, speed and features. Battery is questionable buy is does hold for a few hours! In all a great device for the price :)
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: This is the first tablet that I have purchased and it has not disappointed. The clarity of the screen is great and I love all apps that it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Amy R Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Love my first tablet
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this for my daughter whose 6 years old and she loves it. Everything about this tablet is great so far. It my first so its the best for me right now.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet and price point!
customer_reviews.text: For $100 I really cant complain. This is a great tablet and I guess its worth about $140. Woohoo! That said, I like bigger screens, but I'll consider that next time.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use mainly as an e-reader and a way to skype. It works excellent for both purposes as well as a great hand held for quick internet access. The brightness is easily adjustable, as is the volume. Most apps are available and work well. I have dropped it a few times with no negative effects. Definitely worth the great price!
customer_reviews.author: Sooz

product_meta.title: Coby 8-inch GMS Android 4.0 8GB Internet Tablet 4:3 Capacitive Multi-Touch screen with Built-in Camera, Black (MID8065-8)
product_meta.description:
8-Inch ANDROID OS touchscreen tablet, powered by a 1.2GHz Dual Core Processor with 1GB of RAM. Access a whole new world of apps with Google Play and Google Mobile Services, as well as access to thousands of books with the Kindle E-Reader. Other features include Bluetooth and Wi-Fi connectivity, built-in front and rear camera, and HD resolution with this new tablet.

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Android 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich, 8 inches Display
8 GB Flash Memory, 1 GB RAM Memory
